targets.expr: topk(10, sum by (method, route) (rate(http_requests_total{job=~"$service", status_code=~"5.."}[5m])) / sum by (method, route) (rate(http_requests_total{job=~"$service"}[5m])) * 100)
topk(10, histogram_quantile(0.95, sum by (le, method, route) (rate(http_request_duration_seconds_bucket{job=~"$service"}[5m]))))
